Glass Pool Fencing & Balustrade

We have a full range of glass pool fencing and balustrade. Contact us for a free measure and quote.

Glass Pool Fencing & Balustrade Gold Coast, Brisbane and Byron Bay

Frameless, Semi-Frameless Glass Pool Fencing & Balustrade
Gold Coast, Brisbane & Byron Bay

Frameless Glass Fencing

Frameless glass pool fencing is the ultimate in style and elegance when it comes to your pools surrounds.

Learn More
Semi-Frameless Glass Fencing

Semi-frameless glass pool fencing is the most cost effective type of glass pool fencing. And it's quite stunning.

Learn More
Glass Balustrade

We have balustrade systems for commercial or residential. Our glass balustrade systems can be frameless, semi frameless or fully framed. Contact us for installation or for DIY (do it yourself).

Learn More
Stair Glass Balustrade

Custom made to meet your exact project requirements. Transform your staircase balustrade into something that is stylish and safe. Call us to discuss how we can help.

Learn More

We focus on the foremost quality in the products and services we offer.

Consistency

All glass is processed from the same float glass supplier for consistency

Quality Control

All glass undergoes strict quality control checks to ensure an optimum product

Meticulous Care

Attention to detail in production and installation so you can be ensured of a consistent top quality product

Tinted Options

Tinted glass available to stand out from the crowd design

Quality that meets Australian Standards.

Australian Standards

Our commitment to quality and compliance means we supply carefully designed products, keeping in mind both the appearance and Australian standards requirements.

Modern Aesthetic

Our Stainless steel hardware’s complement our quality glass panels and are available in Chrome, and Matte black. They are superior in strength and have corrosion resistance for harsh marine environments.

Plastic Hardware

Plastic alternative options which don’t require earthing. 100% composite (plastic) construction means it will never rust or corrode. Made from ultra-robust, UV stabilised materials. Suits 12mm thick glass applications.

About Us

About Millennium Glass

Millennium Glass specialise in a range of glass splashbacks, shower screens, mirrors, sliding wardrobe doors, internal wardrobe shelving, glass pool fencing and balustrading for commercial, DIY and home renovators.
